2069320.name: JUMANJI - Welcome to the Jungle Expansion
2069320.description:
Gather your team, rise up and become the movie heroes: Smolder Bravestone, Mouse Finbar, Shelly Oberon and Ruby Roundhouse, in the official JUMANJI: Welcome to the Jungle Expansion!

This time you’ll be battling jaguars, hippos and more in the Jumanji jungle itself as you make your way toward the mysterious Jaguar Statue. Hunted by the evil and corrupt Professor Russell Van Pelt, every new location on the map will test your skills to the max. Working together has never been so important, as this time your “lives” are shared!

Build your deck, play your cards and restore the Jaguar’s Eye Jewel to save Jumanji!

This expansion includes:

  • 4 EPIC movie characters
  • 7 NEW Dangers
  • 5 NEW Locations

Flex those biceps, fix that bow-tie, straighten that hat, tighten your holsters and get ready for an adventure like no other!
2069320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
